mapper.sql: product_id, merchant_id, category_id, name, description, status, sales_count, is_recommend, sort_order, created_time, updated_time
mapper.select: SELECT p.product_id, p.merchant_id, p.category_id, p.product_name, p.description, p.status, p.sales_count, p.is_recommend, p.sort_order, p.created_time, p.updated_time, MIN(pi.image_url) AS main_image FROM products p LEFT JOIN product_images pi ON p.product_id = pi.product_id AND pi.is_main = 1 GROUP BY p.product_id ORDER BY p.sales_count DESC LIMIT #{page.offset}, #{page.size}

SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.description, p.status, p.sales_count, p.is_recommend, p.sort_order, pi.image_url AS image_url, ps.sku_id, ps.sku_name, ps.price, ps.stock_quantity, ps.image_url AS sku_image_url FROM products p LEFT JOIN product_images pi ON p.product_id = pi.product_id LEFT JOIN product_skus ps ON p.product_id = ps.product_id WHERE p.product_id = #{productId}
